name: Rube Goldberg Machine (Anik Barua)
description:
Name: Anik Barua

CS - UY 3113

Summary - I created an Rube Goldberg Machine in Unity using physics engine. The machine contains rolling spheres, blocks, hinges and a full dominos setup. I experimented with the different materials for example: colors that I included in my elements, and added different constrains, integrated images and created prefab for easy use.
